description:
Experience Resident Evil 3 Cloud Gameplay Demo with a level visual fidelity beyond the norm for portable consoles through the power of the cloud

The chase is on. Time for the final escape!

Note: This demo is intended for the purpose of confirming the suitability of your internet connection for playing cloud-streamed content comfortably. It features a specially-tuned section from the opening of the game which can be played 3 times.
name: Resident Evil 3 Cloud Gameplay Demo
intro: THIS GAME USES CLOUD STREAMING. TESTING USING THIS FREE DEMO IS REQUIRED FOR PURCHASING FULL ACCESS TO THE GAME
